title: OPEN WI.DE! OPEN Cycle serves up tasty limited collaborations w/ Atomik, ENVE & Black Magic Paint
content:
The OPEN U.P. pushed the boundaries of what defined a gravel bike when it came out, notably with its signature dropped chainstay design allowing for some of the biggest tire-clearance available at the time. The dropped drive-side chainstay allows the necessary space for a wider tire clearing up to 2.1‚Äù tires on the U.P. as […]
